uvi.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v5.4.135
uvi.description:
net: qcom/emac: fix UAF in emac_remove

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.135 by commit 2b70ca92847c619d6264c7372ef74fcbfd1e048c, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit 54e19bc74f3380d414681762ceed9f7245bc6a6e. For more details please see the references link.
